markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Discreet Inquiry](/Feats.aspx?ID=2121) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 204 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) or Expert in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

</column>

---

You are subtle in your efforts to learn the things you need to know. When [Gathering Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49), you can hide the true subject of your inquiry among other topics of little interest to you without increasing the difficulty of the check or taking more time to Gather Information. Anyone trying to Gather Information to determine if someone else was asking around about the topic in question must exceed your [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) DC or the normal DC to Gather Information about your inquiries, whichever is higher, or else they don't learn of your efforts.
name: Discreet Inquiry
prerequisite: Expert in Deception or Expert in Diplomacy
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 204 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) or Expert in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Gather Information without revealing your motive.
</summary>
summary: Gather Information without revealing your motive.
summary_markdown: Gather Information without revealing your motive.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 2" pfs="Standard" > Discreet Inquiry Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 204 2.0 Prerequisites Expert in Deception or Expert in Diplomacy --- You are subtle in your efforts to learn the things you need to know. When Gathering Information, you can hide the true subject of your inquiry among other topics of little interest to you without increasing the difficulty of the check or taking more time to Gather Information. Anyone trying to Gather Information to determine if someone else was asking around about the topic in question must exceed your Deception DC or the normal DC to Gather Information about your inquiries, whichever is higher, or else they don't learn of your efforts.
